categories: Category:Star Wars: The Official Magazine articles

nodes.text:
Inspired by Empire is an article published in the Star Wars Magazine UK 66 written by Pete Vilmur.
The article talks about Lawrence Noble, a sculptor/illustrator that has worked on Star Wars since 1980, and several of his posters and sculptures, including a bronze statue of Yoda made in 1980, which was only released ten years later to commemorate the anniversary of The Empire Strikes Back.
